快速开始 #

用法 #

完整引入 #

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import TiTansUI from 'titans-ui'
import 'titans-ui/dist/index.css'
import App from './App.vue'

const app = createApp(App)
app.use(TiTansUI)
app.mount('#app')
